description: Enterprise techniques used by gsecdump, ATT&CK software S0008 (v1.2)
name: gsecdump (S0008)

techniques.comment: [gsecdump](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0008) can dump Windows password hashes from the SAM.(Citation: Microsoft Gsecdump)
[gsecdump](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0008) can dump LSA secrets.(Citation: TrueSec Gsecdump)
